info.title: dbapi-sepaCreditTransfer
info.description: Easily initiate SEPA credit transfer then if required cancel or get the status and get the details afterwards.

post.description: This API is for creating a Sepa Credit Transfer

parameters.name: idempotency-id
parameters.description: Unique id of the service call. Must be present during retries to avoid multiple processing of the same request

parameters.name: otp
parameters.description: One time password required for SCT creation, you can use photo tan or push tan. In case of push tan pass otp as 'PUSHTAN'. in case of photo tan please generate otp by using transaction authorisation APIs. there you must use requestType as 'SEPA_TRANSFER_GRANT'.

parameters.name: Correlation-Id
parameters.description: Free form key controlled by the caller e.g. uuid

400.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 400. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: Invalid value for %s.
Unable to identify transaction by Id.
OTP invalid challenge response: %s.
Invalid OTP.
Booking date from must precede booking date to.
Invalid value for 'sortBy'. Valid values are 'bookingDate[ASC]' and 'bookingDate[DESC]'.
not supported
it seems that you started a non pushTAN challenge. Please use the PATCH endpoint to continue
it seems that you started a pushTAN challenge. Please use the GET endpoint to continue
Parameters in the url or content type are incorrect, please check and retry.
Contracting bank details are Invalid or Missing.
The accepted instructed amount currency is EUR. Please correct your entry and try again.
Parameters submitted are missing or invalid.
Invalid execution date.
Cancellation is not allowed for this transaction.
The parameter in the request does not match with the latest Auth id.
Current status does not allow second factor update with the action provided.
Invalid execution date.
The source iban or account type is invalid.
Cancellation is not allowed for this transaction.
The accepted creditor account currency is EUR. Please correct your entry and try again.
The requested collection date should not be a public holiday or in the weekends. Please try again.
The requested execution date should not be greater than 90 days in the future. Please try again.
Invalid value: requestedExecutionDate must match yyyy-MM-dd format.
The accepted debtor account currency is EUR. Please correct your entry and try again.
There is no legal entity present for the source iban. Please correct your entry and try again.
You have reached the maximum allowable limit for the day. Please wait until tomorrow to initiate additional transfers or reduce your transfer amount and try again.

401.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 401. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: The requested function requires a SCA Level Authentication.

404.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 404. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: The parameters in the request do not match the initial request.
Sepa payment not found.

409.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 409. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: The IdempotencyId already being used.

delete.description: Cancel a previously initiated Sepa Credit Transfer.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Payment Id of Sepa Credit Transfer

parameters.description: Unique id of the service call. Must be present during retries to avoid multiple processing of the same request

tags: Second factor retry for Sepa Credit Transfer
patch.summary: Second factor retry for Sepa Credit Transfer
patch.description: User can retry the second factor if it's failed, The new once's will be initiated after deleting the existing once's.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Payment Id of Sepa Credit Transfer

parameters.name: idempotency-id
parameters.description: Unique id of the service call. Must be present during retries to avoid multiple processing of the same request

parameters.name: otp
parameters.description: One time password required for second factor update, in case of push tan use 'PUSHTAN'. in case of photo tan please generate otp by using transaction authorisation APIs. there you must use requestType corresponds to the action. for create action it must be 'SEPA_TRANSFER_GRANT' and for cancel 'SEPA_TRANSFER_CANCELLATION'.

parameters.name: Correlation-Id
parameters.description: Free form key controlled by the caller e.g. uuid

400.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 400. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: Invalid value for %s.

it seems that you started a pushTAN challenge. Please use the GET endpoint to continue

example.message: The requested function requires a SCA Level Authentication.

Sepa payment not found.

409.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 409. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: The IdempotencyId already being used.

RequestedExecutionDate.description: must match yyyy-MM-dd format, also in CET timezone.

RemittanceInformationStructured.description: recommended to be used in each transaction ; contract related - references to the business; it depends on the client what they want to include

RemittanceInformationUnstructured.description: recommended to be used in each transaction ; contract related : references to the business; it depends on the client what they want to include

EndToEndId.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction

CreditorName.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party

message.description: Description of the belonging error code.

messageId.description: dbAPI internal message-id (unique identifier) that allow reference to each of your API calls.

TransactionStatus.description: Specifies the status of a transaction in a coded form based on SEPA Rulebook: AT-R1 The type of R-message 'RJCT in case of a negative confirmation or reject, or 'ACCP' in case of a positive confirmation. 'PDNG' value is possible in case Payment Order Response is sent for not yet rejected transaction

Action.description: defines the action for retry second factor, CREATE is for updating the second factor for create Sepa Credit Transfer and  CANCEL is for cancel

PaymentId.description: resource identification of the generated paymentinitiation resource ('Transaction-ID' from the header which is populated with the Intra Bank ID); should be available at least when status is PDNG or ACCP

AuthId.description: Authentication Id used for update SCA status SEPA payment, It will be valid for 5 minutes.

scopes.sepa_credit_transfers: Initiate and check status of Sepa Credit Transfer
scopes.openid: Request access to OpenId Connect functionality
